title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description: Steps to reproduce:1. Launch WSWB and create two projects2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose the option to export as a Zip File4.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the export process fails.
EB: The export process should succeed and all the files with the same name but in different directories should be included in the zip file without any issues.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt').3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose the option to export as a Zip File.4. Observe that the export process fails and does not include all the files with the same name but in different directories in the zip file.
